Package com.example.nachos_app

Class NotificationSender

java.lang.Object
com.example.nachos_app.NotificationSender
public class NotificationSender extends Object
NotificationSender responsible for sending win and loss notifications after the lottery is drawn.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotificationSender

      public NotificationSender(String eventId, String eventName, com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db)
      Creates a new notification sender to use in sending notifications
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event performing a lottery draw
      eventName - Name of event that corresponds with eventId
      db - The connection to the firebase database

  • Method Details

    • sendSelectionNotifications

      public void sendSelectionNotifications(List<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot> winners, List<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot> waitlist)
      Writes win/loss notifications to winners/the rest of the entrants respectively. Checks user's notification preferences before sending.
      Parameters:
      winners - List of documents containing UIDs of selected winners
      waitlist - List of documents containing UIDs of waiting list

    • sendListNotifications

      public void sendListNotifications(String message)
      US 02.07.01, US 02.07.02, US 02.07.03 Sends notifications to the selected, cancelled or waiting lists. Before calling this method one needs to call setUserIds and setType on their NotificationSender Respects notification preferences defined by the user
      Parameters:
      message - Custom text to send to the user
